'''Revion''' was a [[Silvan Elves|Silvan elf]] garrisoned at the [[Watchtower of Ostirith]] during the [[Second Age]]. Revion was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]] and is portrayed by [[Simon Merrells]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=28 July 2022}}</ref>
